citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:15 PM on March
25, 2025. The inspector contacted the licensee by phone who explained not being available for inspection today. Failure
to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations.
Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:15 PM on March 
25, 2025. The inspector contacted the licensee by phone who explained not being available for inspection today. Failure 
to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. 
Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
